headline: Evaluating Pool Corporation (POOL) Valuation Following Strategic Partnership With Aiper in Robotic Pool Cleaners
summary: Pool (POOL) just entered a strategic partnership with Aiper, opening up its entire network of retailers and service companies to a range of robotic pool cleaners. This move could boost Pool’s influence and product variety across North America. See our latest analysis for Pool. While Pool’s new alliance with Aiper broadened its reach in the pool supply sector, shares have mostly moved sideways, with a 1-year total shareholder return of -0.15%. Momentum remains muted compared to prior years,...
